entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IOException in WorkloadResolver in 6.0.200 SDK #23264
  • CS8032 error in VS2019 if EnforceCodeStyleInBuild is set and .NET SDK 6 is installed #23261
  • Microsoft.NET.Sdk.IL is not creating documentation file #23257
  • "dotnet build --no-restore" restores all dependencies #23279

Closed

  • Reenable TestPreviewFeatures test #20325
  • UserSecretsId attribute not generated when M.E.C.UserSecrets reference transitively #4007
  • installing dotnet sdk on docker image fails with the new version of dotnet-sdk-5.0-5.0.404-1.x86_64 and aspnetcore-runtime-5.0.x86_64 0:5.0.13-1 #23069

PullRequests

Created

  • Add missing space to dotnet-watch restart always rude edit message (#23281) #23282
  • Add missing space to dotnet-watch restart always rude edit message #23281
  • Build Microsoft.NET.Build.Tasks for netfx during source-build #23266
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Handle the case when procfs is inaccessible #22927
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add an environment variable to prevent prompting rude edits (#22891) #23280
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1.4xx #23060
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fixes aspnetcore#38798 #22891
  • reenable test #23236
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0.2xx #23059
    Area-Infrastructure
  • fixes dotnet/sdk#23162 dotnet new console --help doesn't work starting 6.0.2xx #23164
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Opt into IEventSource4 #23249
    Area-NetSDK
  • Update .vsts-ci.yml #23022
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Update System.CommandLine #23085
    Area-CLI
  • Warn instead of Error for Windows7 SingleFile #23177
    Area-External, Area-SingleFile
  • userlocal detection: also force last digits to zero for non-preview versions. #23080
    Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'main' #23232
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0.1xx] bump the error number for CompressionInSingleFileRequiresSelfContained #22676
    Servicing-consider
  • Update .vsts-ci-richnav.yml #22916
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Ensure case-insensitive web.config file name is used #14854
    Area-WebSDK, 7.0.1xx
